name: Get Off My Lawn! (itch) (Atty)
description:
Gramma Morley is about to fight the construction agency to protect her home.

"Get Off My Lawn" was made for Global Game Jam 2019 by Atharv Vohra, Rishi Barnwal, Boris Fleysher and Omer Ahmed. It's a beat-em-up game with a combo system and an ongoing narrative about what it means to fight for home.

Controls - WASD to move, J - Light attack, K - Heavy attack. Every 4th attack is a special attack that has an important effect, in classic beat-em-up fashion.
